byline.contributor: Alissa Rubin and Lilia Blaise reported from Nice, and Adam Nossiter and Aurelien Breeden from Paris. Reporting was contributed by Andrew Higgins from Nice; Liz Alderman and Benoît Morenne from Paris; Dan Bilefsky, Sewell Chan and Kimiko de Freytas-Tamura from London; Rukmini Callimachi and Rick Gladstone from New York; Eric Schmitt from Washington; and Farah Samti from Tunis.
byline.original: By ALISSA J. RUBIN, LILIA BLAISE, ADAM NOSSITER and AURELIEN BREEDEN

lead_paragraph: The man, 31, had no known links to the militant extremists who have targeted and traumatized France.

headline.main: France Says Truck Attacker Was Tunisia Native With Record of Petty Crime

snippet: The man, 31, had no known links to the militant extremists who have targeted and traumatized France....
